metadata.othernotes:
FYI: If you want to target her outfit, be wary of future costumes. Especially her underwear—it won't always have a tomato pattern, nor can I guarantee it'll always be on the same layer. I'm using a bunch of markers so you can target them instead of her stage and/or costume.

Personality:
- Energetic. Excitable and has an active imagination.
- Pushy. Often assumes others think similiarly to herself, and overly aggressive when trying to make friends.
- Confident. Talks big about herself or her own skills to try to get a reaction.
- Selfish. Will think about others, but only after she's served herself.
- Strange. Enjoys anything unusual and takes great pleasure in subverting others' expectations.
- Lazy. Willing to give up at a moment's notice unless it's something she really cares about.
- Horny. She's here to see others naked, and getting naked herself is a means to that end.
- Observant. Usually won't tell you, but she notices more than she lets on.
- Reliable. Sometimes, when she isn't joking.
- Easygoing. Despite her energy, she isn't truly fazed by much. One of the few things that does bother her is realizing that someone truly dislikes her.
- Enjoys teasing and confusing others to get a rise out of them. Uses a lot of bait-and-switch humor.

Useful info:
- Naturally assumes the boke/funny guy role of a manzai duo.
- Jokes often involve misleading the others or outright lying to them.
- Runs a doujin circle at Comuket dedicated to "Witch Girl Mirakurun," her favorite anime/manga, under the pen name Ramuko Nishikyogoku.
- Skilled at arts and crafts, both normal things like modelling clay and weird things like cutting designs into apple skins.
- Big eater. Easy to please with food and will eat almost anything.
- Her favorite food is rum raisin, a flavor of ice cream.
- The Amusement Club originally consisted of herself and her friends Yui, Akari, and Chinatsu, but now includes the student council of the time: Ayano, Chitose, Sakurako, and Himawari.
- Had a stolen clubroom in middle school, but not since then.

I made a bunch of markers for lines I didn't feel were worth a situation but could be targeted anyway if you so choose. Most of these are prefixed with D, Q, or S.

case.name: The ribbon stays
case.description: Kyouko says she isn't going to remove her ribbon. If she's in her default outfit, she's lying, but this is otherwise true.

case.name: The ribbon doesn't stay
case.description: Kyouko lied earlier about taking off her ribbon. An observant character may have gotten suspicious because of how often she brought it up. (this only happens in her default outfit)

case.name: Bad hand trick
case.description: Once a game, Kyouko may act like her hand is terrible to get the others' hopes up. If responding the next phase (when hands are revealed), use a condition to check that the marker equals 1.

case.name: Sexy Poses
case.description: Kyouko sometimes pulls "sexy" poses throughout the game to distract the others. Well, sexy for her, maybe.

notes.note:
The marker is available so other characters can see which uniform she's wearing just in case they absolutely need to know for whatever reason. FYI, it's always unset when she loses the red dress.
That said, do not use this specifically for an interaction. There's a reason I didn't make a situation for it.

Switching back to her right hand here was intentional.
Also, this is global because an opponent masturbating line somehow snuck in between this line and the one that was supposed to precede it.
I refuse to elaborate on why the scope is lying.
kinda wish 2D and 3D art had separate tags cuz this is kinda hard when I can't assume the target draws a lot
Kyouko will try to fix her hair literally the next case after "Finished (Self)" plays. This and the game ending should be the only things that interrupt that in order to prevent inconsistency.
Kyoko says she keeps her ribbon on (and sets the same marker) in a few other cases, but this one is the most reliable. Yes, there are two markers for this. Feel free to target whichever you like.
In case it doesn't come through, she's trying to mislead him
You could target this if you wanted your character to immediately notice the pattern on her panties. As far as making that future-proof, though, here be dragons.
These stripping/stripped lines are pretty much placeholders so the dialogue ties into what Kyouko just said. Feel free to ignore them with Nagatoro and continue the conversation instead.
Placeholder to give Nagatoro time to respond. I just wrote this so her sequence makes sense with context from the Must Strip case
These *should* always get out-prioritized, but I'm not perfect so who knows?
I'll come back for the other line later. I decided I could at least respond to one since I know where I could go from here.
Yes, these are mixed in with the usual opponent masturbating lines.
Yes, these are mixed in with the usual opponent masturbating lines.

If I could include moe I would, but I'm not sure how to get the conditions to work out where any of blonde, small_breasts, or moe counts for this. I'm kinda just leaning on moe+!short+!small_breasts being rare

Literally don't have any better pose for this yet
iffy on whether to include finished in this, (in other words, todo: stage 9 lines)

label.label: First out, no one else masturbating
Don't ignore the results to fix hair
Give ~player~ the ribbon *and* say the line, god dammit
What to do with a cute, cool, and sexy drawing?
Hasn't tricked player, or isn't going to remove
If she didn't take her ribbon off
Did not play ribbon trick this game
Did not play ribbon trick this game
How much tomato wear DOES she have?
Underwear cried out (was removed under clothes)
Kyouko's birthday (only one in a costume)
get it cuz she's a tomato and tomatoes go squish
Invited 3+ cute blonde girls (player not attracted)
Socks - playing w/ onesie and normal pajamas

markers.marker: Kyouko will bluff on a good hand once per game.
She's the only one wearing a costume to her party?
Where are the good cards? How are they?
How do the discarded cards feel?
On her birthday, Kyouko remembers that time just doesn't pass (like in her series; yes, that's canon)
Throwing items into a game of poker
Her "help" might be junk poker advice. Or something else.
Someone else is removing their hair ribbon.
Someone else is removing their hair ribbon after Kyouko has taken hers off.
She tries switching hands... for exactly one phase.
Switches back to her right hand (or rather, both) immediately after trying to switch hands.
Are you gonna show it the world?
The club's been out a room for a while now.
Assuming they draw like she does.
What they do with their creations.
Kyouko pulls a "sexy" pose if someone brings a camera.
Lots of horny students at the Inventory
The Smash characters at the table make her want to play it herself.
"High Tension" rules to... make the game more intense?
Extremely unusual but apparently not non-existent if xkcd is to be believed
Never mind that everyone just got done playing a card game.
The water's right there. You might as well.
Self Must Strip - First to get "in uniform" on her birthday
Self Stripped - Both her bra and panties—tomato themed—are visible. (Club Uniform)
Early in first topless stage - the barely visible nipples
First hand on stage 7 - Kyouko took away her ribbon and sidetails at the same time, making a pretty jarring change of appearance. (Club Uniform)
Self Stripping 6 - Taking the ribbon off (Club Uniform)
Self Stripping - Kyouko plans to keep her ribbon.
Self Stripped - The tomato pattern on her underwear is visible. (Club Uniform)
Self Stripping 2 - Explain the uniform (Club Uniform)
Responses to Kirigiri asking how much tomato wear she has
Natsuki Stage 5 - Kyouko sees fun underwear
Natsuki Stage 5 - Kyouko sees fun underwear
Natsuki Stage 5 - Kyouko sees fun underwear
Self Must Strip 0 / Kirigiri Must Strip 0
Kyoko Kirigiri and Kyou Fujibayashi selected, player named Kyouko or Kyoko
Intenal state. Vast majority of this will only be relevant to Kyouko herself.
Set when Comuket is less than two weeks away. (That is, the first couple weeks of August and last couple weeks of December; the real-life Comiket is held around the end of those time frames)
Prevent Kyouko from fixing her hair on the Game Over case.
Sets up the global case where Kyouko fixes her hair.
Count the games Kyouko's played (to completion) with you
Game over: Kyouko puts her jacket back on.
Kyouko has taken her ribbon off in her default outfit at some point.
The player wore the Kyouko's Ribbon collectible to the game
The player has worn the Kyouko's Ribbon collectible in the past.
The player brought Kyouko's ribbon but took it off.
Kyouko assures the player she won't take off her ribbon last time (Sexy Tomato)
Kyouko tricked the others by taking her ribbon off last game.
Kyouko has only gotten bad hands until this is set.
People keep taking off small stuff, meanwhile Kyouko's the only one who's down to her underwear.
Count how many pairs of underwear someone's wearing.
If set, Kyouko is wearing her long-sleeved uniform. There's a reason I didn't make a situation for this.
